name: Karma
description:
A soldier who wants to take revenge of his father's brutal murder by Terrorists, Now he decided to destroy all the bases and camps of terrorists. He goes on mission on various terrorist's camps for destroying and kill them all. During this journey he has to face various challenges and dangerous enemies around him.

Realistic first person shooter game with lots of action and eye catching graphics in it, All missions are unique in game mechanics.
Key feature:
(1) Multiple weapons.
(2) Inventory.
(3) Smart Enemy AI.
(4) Realistic Graphics.
(5) Campaign Gameplay.
(6) Interesting story line.
